metadata.title: CVE-2020-9366 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow was found in the way GNU Screen before 4.8.0 treated thespecial escape OSC 49. Specially crafted output, or a special program,could corrupt memory and crash Screen or possibly have unspecified otherimpact.

criterions.comment: screen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
